discourse_list.title: Deep dive into Current PoW Difficulty Adjustment Algorithm and a Possible Alternative - X-Post from EthResearch

content.content: Deep dive into Current PoW Difficulty Adjustment Algorithm and a Possible Alternative by @MadeofTin, with some previous research performed with @tjayrush
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal for a possible alternative to the current PoW difficulty adjustment algorithm. The author provides a deep dive into the proposal and includes previous research performed with another individual. A 3rd party could provide constructive criticism of the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
